options.content: The `Highlights` section of this dashboard is dependent on the `CIFSSession` template. By default, these templates are disabled to prevent any potential slowdown in data collection, which can occur due to the processing of a large number of metrics. If you're using the Zapi/Rest collector, it's necessary to enable the `CIFSSession` template within its configuration settings.

panels.description: The number of CIFS connections associated with the CIFS session.
panels.title: Top $TopResources Connection Count

panels.description: The number of CIFS connections associated with SMB version.
panels.title: Connection Count By SMB version

panels.description: This panel includes sum of read and write SMB OP’s /sec.
panels.title: Read / Write IOPS

panels.description: This panel includes average SMB read and write latency.
panels.title: Read / Write Latency

panels.description: This panel includes SMB OP’s /sec average broken down by other SMB operations.
panels.title: Other IOPS

panels.description: This panel includes SMB latency broken down by other SMB operations.
panels.title: Other Latency

options.content:
These panels require that the eight `_histogram` counters be uncommented in the respective SMB2 template.
`RestPerf` template in `conf/restperf/9.14.1/smb2.yaml`
`ZapiPerf` template in `conf/zapiperf/cdot/9.8.0/smb2.yaml`
Enabling the SMB2 histogram counters may cause the poller to use more memory if there are a large number of histogram metrics to export.

panels.description: This panel tracks histograms for Session Setups and gives good indication of Client Authentication Latency Breakdown.
panels.title: Session Setup Latency Heatmap

panels.description: This panel tracks histograms for file opens and creates.
panels.title: Create Latency Heatmap

panels.description: This panel tracks histograms for file closes.
panels.title: Close Latency Heatmap

panels.description: This panel tracks histograms for file locks.
panels.title: Lock Latency Heatmap

panels.description: This panel tracks histograms for readdir.
panels.title: Query Directory Latency Heatmap

panels.description: This panel tracks histograms for getattr.
panels.title: Query Info Latency Heatmap

panels.description: This panel tracks histograms for setattr.
panels.title: Set Info Latency Heatmap

panels.description: This panel tracks histograms for oplock breaks.
panels.title: Oplock Break Latency Heatmap
